abstract: Lewis Hamilton clinches his first pole at Monaco Grand Prix auto race; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Hamilton clinched his first pole at the Monaco Grand Prix, while his Mercedes teammate Nico Rosberg will start from second in Sunday’s race as he bids to win it for the third straight year.

headline.main: Lewis Hamilton Gains Pole at Monaco Grand Prix

snippet: Hamilton clinched his first pole at the Monaco Grand Prix, while his Mercedes teammate Nico Rosberg will start from second in Sunday’s race as he bids to win it for the third straight year.
